Text:
Wow!! All smiles.  Scanning thru the list and i cant stop licking my lips. Love all the christian books you throw in here - Larry richards, John Piper, daniel kahneman, duhigg......Plenty of gems in this collection

Thankx again

I'll be putting up part two soon. I'll also cobble together a large Christian collection.
